fields.name: Usage: /role <role>
fields.value: Opens the role edit menu to modify the attributes of this **role**.

fields.name: Toggle adding to new members
fields.value: Toggles whether the chosen role will be added to users when they join the server.

fields.name: Toggle adding to inactive members
fields.value: Toggles whether the role will be added to users when they become inactive for the duration specified in the server settings.

fields.name: Toggle requesting
fields.value: Toggles whether users can add or remove the role from themselves using the **/requestrole** command.

fields.name: Toggle time parameter
fields.value: If the role can be requested, toggles whether users can have the role permanently or temporarily.

fields.name: Set agreement
fields.value: Toggles whether users will have to consent to an agreement before receiving the role. Leave blank to disable.

fields.name: Set roles to add if removed
fields.value: Allows you to select a list of roles that are added to the user if the role is removed by **/requestrole**, or from the role being removed by timeout.

fields.name: Set roles to remove if added
fields.value: Allows you to select a list of roles that are added to the user if the role is added by **/requestrole**, or from the role being added due to inactivity.

fields.name: Save
fields.value: This saves edits to the role. Be sure to use this when you're done!

fields.name: Clear data
fields.value: This removes all attributes from the role.
